name: Jam (Chapter 1)
description:
Squiggles is a living squirrel who's moving to a town populated by talking stuffed animals. While there he meets a grumpy entry officer, a playfull rabbit and a vicious raccoon. Go through Squiggle's experiences in this new world through exiting delatrune-esque fights, different attacks, and items you can buy from the Shop. This was made as a remaster/reimagining of my Rhythm Game called "Jam (Legacy Edition)." Chapter 2 may come out If anyone wants it or If I want to continue this story. Thanks for playing, and this can be played in your browser for your playing enjoyment.

1.5.0: Remastered Assets, Added Music, Changed Loading Menu, Added Downloadable Build, Added New Death Mechanic, Added Public Assets

*Might be a bit buggy because scratch struggles running big projects like this one.

*feel free to give me helpful feedback!

JAM LEGACY EDITION: https://gamejolt.com/games/jamrhythm/648276

JAM COMPLETE PLAYLIST: https://gamejolt.com/playlist/jam-the-complete-playlist/474184
